headline: PERMITLESS CARRY, A TOP NRA PRIORITY, ADVANCING ACROSS Ohio and COUNTRY DESPITE WIDESPREAD OPPOSITION
author: David Miller -
sentences: Just in the past week, Ohio Governor Mike DeWine and Alabama Governor Kay Ivey sided with the gun lobby and signed new permitless carry bills into law, ignoring widespread opposition from law enforcement, community leaders, and their constituents.

Give to Everytown and Help Defeat the Gun Lobbyâ€™s Extremism
Everytown for Gun Safety has a plan to end gun violence and urgently needs your help to stop permitless carry from building momentum before more of these laws are enacted.
Permitless carry laws allow people to carry concealed handguns in public without a permit, without training, and without a background check.
If the gun lobby gets its way, more than half the country will have permitless carry laws in place by the end of 2022.
Donate to help us stop dangerous new gun laws and fuel our fight to end gun violence.
These laws are dangerous, and for obvious reasons.
Even far-right extremists and white supremacists.
